notes: Stage 3b goes into effect, personal services such as massages allowed to reopen, but bars and nightclubs remain closed.    Phase 3b guidance:  https://web.archive.org/web/20200618213747/https://www.gov.bm/sites/default/files/Phase-3B.pdf

Nova Scotia:  From 18th June on:  -Family household bubbles are replaced with a 10-person gathering limit without social distancing  -Gathering limit increased to 50 people for indoor and outdoor gatherings with social distancing    https://web.archive.org/web/20200623164319/https://novascotia.ca/coronavirus/restriction-updates/

countryname: Note: Data from 30 Jun 2020. Individual countries may be several days older.
Source: Oxford COVID-19 Government Response Tracker. More at: github.com/OxCGRT/covid-policy-tracker or bsg.ox.ac.uk/covidtracker
